products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Infusion ASC FR Black
products.description: Infusion asc fr perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. The flame retardant coating also makes it suitable for contract applications. Perfect fit pleated blind infusion asc fr black available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct.

products.title: Infusion Solar Black Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. One of their deepest black shades, this colour is great for allowing some light through while creating a bold, modern finish. Product id: db-nfpl0003 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Infusion Solar Black Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar black pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0009 fabric colour: black headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
